channel.title: Sorghum Bicolor on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Sorghum Bicolor on funPlantGenes

item.title: Bmr2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Sb04g005210 Gene Symbol: Bmr2 Gene Name: Brown midrib2 Genome: Species: Sorghum bicolor Functional Descriptions: Brown midrib2 (Bmr2) encodes the major 4-coumarate:coenzymeA ligase involved in lignin biosynthesis in sorghum.

item.title: SbEhd1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Sobic.001G227900 Gene Symbol: SbEhd1 Gene Name: EARLY HEADING DATE 1 Genome: Sorghum bicolor v.

item.title: SbGhd7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Sobic.006G004400 Gene Symbol: SbGhd7 Gene Name: GRAIN NUMBER, PLANT HEIGHT AND HEADING DATE 7 Genome: Sorghum bicolor v.

item.title: SbHMA3a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Sobic.002G083000 Gene Symbol: SbHMA3a Gene Name: HMA3 transporter Genome: Species: Sorghum bicolor Functional Descriptions: Sorghum Ionomics Reveals the Functional SbHMA3a Allele that Limits Excess Cadmium Accumulation in Grains.

item.title: SbMATE
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Sb03g043890 Gene Symbol: SbMATE Gene Name: multi-drug and toxic compound extrusion Genome: Species: Sorghum bicolor Functional Descriptions: Sugarcane plants constitutively overexpressing the Sorghum bicolor MATE gene (SbMATE) showed improved tolerance to Al when compared to non-transgenic (NT) plants, characterized by sustained root growth and exclusion of aluminum from the root apex based on the result obtained with hematoxylin staining.

item.title: SbMyb60
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Sobic.004G273800 Gene Symbol: SbMyb60 Gene Name: Genome: sorghum genome (Yilmaz et al.

item.title: SbPSTOL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Sb03g006765 Gene Symbol: SbPSTOL1 Gene Name: PHOSPHORUS-STARVATION TOLERANCE1 Genome: Species: Sorghum bicolor Functional Descriptions: SbPSTOL1 genes colocalized with quantitative trait loci for traits underlying root morphology and dry weight accumulation under low P via linkage mapping.

item.title: SbSAI-2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SbSAI-2 Gene Name: soluble acid invertase 2 Genome: Species: Sorghum bicolor Functional Descriptions: The sorghum soluble acid invertase gene SbSAI-2 was cloned and the function verified in Pichia pastoris and rice, showing the SbSAI-2 affects composition and content of sugar in stem juice.

item.title: SbVIN1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Sobic. 004G004800 Gene Symbol: SbVIN1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Sorghum bicolor Functional Descriptions: Vacuolar invertase genes SbVIN1 and SbVIN2 are differently associated with stem and grain traits in sorghum (Sorghum bicolor).

item.title: SbVIN2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Sobic. 006G160700 Gene Symbol: SbVIN2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Sorghum bicolor Functional Descriptions: Vacuolar invertase genes SbVIN1 and SbVIN2 are differently associated with stem and grain traits in sorghum (Sorghum bicolor).
